General.Name: FlexQube AB
General.Description: FlexQube AB (publ) designs, develops, manufactures, and markets flexible and robust industrial carts for material handling in Europe and North America. It also offers carts, such as eQart, a smart and motorized cart, pallet and container, shelf, flow, hanging, mother-daughter, and kit carts and specialized solutions, as well as parts comprising standard building blocks, casters, fasteners/hardware, handle bars, tow bar components, attachments, shelves, tools, springs, pallet guides, rollers, and pallet changing system components. The company serves automobile industries; distribution and storage; cars; commercial vehicles, such as buses, trucks, and trains; wind turbines and other energy related products; defense equipment; appliances and electronics; medical equipment; and construction and industrial machinery industries. FlexQube AB (publ) was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.
